data.name: Idle Champions - Force Grey Hitch Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get a special Force Grey boost with a full set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Hitch! We'll also toss in 5 Gold Chests to power you up even more!

This pack includes:

  • Magnificent Cape of Free Flowing (Golden Epic)
  • Multi-Pouch (Rare)
  • Sticky Boots (Rare)
  • Golden Dagger (Rare)
  • Crystal Ring (Rare)
  • Static Rod (Rare)
  • 5 Gold Chests

fullgame.name: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Classic
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
